attributes.additional_details: My other concern is that any statistical information gathered by the government on job vacancies may be misleading. You will open a whole can of worms here if this petition gains momentum.
attributes.background: We have a unprecedented problem within the recruitment industry. Recruitment agents are advertising jobs that do not exist. This is then used to gather more information to build there CV database and gain favourable information from the job hunter.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about recruitment, but we're not sure exactly what kind of regulation you'd like the Government or Parliament to introduce. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
